name: Deep Snails Night
description:
Deep Snails Night!

An asteroid as hit the Earth... Evil Snails are invading... but Slugster, our hero, is not one to give in!

  • This Game was done during the #LudumDare48 Game Jam in 72 hours. (Actually it was done in 60 hours from start to finish).
  • I used Construct2 for the programming & Photoshop for the drawings.
  • This is the first time I'm doing a video game all by myself.
  • The music, "Spooky Ride", is by Twin Musicom (Creative Commons By Attribution License) http://www.twinmusicom.org/
